cards.name: Unfair Stamp
cards.effect:
You can use this card only if any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out during your opponent's last turn.

Each player shuffles their hand into their deck. Then, you draw 5 cards, and your opponent draws 2 cards.

attacks.name: Slow Crunch
attacks.effect: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon. At the end of your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon will be Knocked Out.

attacks.name: Redirected Sunlight
attacks.effect: This attack does 60 damage for each {R} Energy attached to all of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Mega Drain
attacks.effect: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Festival Lead
abilities.effect: If Festival Grounds is in play, this Pokémon may use an attack it has twice. If the first attack Knocks Out your opponent's Active Pokémon, you may attack again after your opponent chooses a new Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Do the Wave
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage for each of your Benched Pokémon.

abilities.name: Storehouse Hideaway
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, prevent all damage from and effects of attacks from your opponent's Pokémon done to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Ramming Shell
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Fire Spin
attacks.effect: Discard 2 Energy from this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Pyro Dance
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may attach a Basic {R} Energy card, a Basic {F} Energy card, or 1 of each from your hand to your Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Scorching Fire
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Freezing Shroud
abilities.effect: During Pokémon Checkup, put 1 damage counter on each Pokémon that has an Ability (both yours and your opponent's), except any Froslass.

attacks.name: Beckon
attacks.effect: Put a Supporter card from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Energy Press
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Spit Shot
attacks.effect: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 120 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Wild Charge
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Thunder Shock
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Homeward Chime
attacks.effect: Shuffle 1 of your Benched Pokémon and all attached cards into your deck.

attacks.name: Love Resonance
attacks.effect: If any of your Pokémon in play are the same type as any of your opponent's Pokémon in play, this attack does 120 more damage.

attacks.name: Blazing Destruction
attacks.effect: Discard a Stadium in play.

attacks.name: Take Down
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Assault Laser
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attached, this attack does 80 more damage.

attacks.name: Best Punch
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Steel Tackle
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Find a Friend
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

abilities.name: Attract Customers
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, you may look at the top 6 cards of your deck, reveal a Supporter card you find there, and put it into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

attacks.name: Lucky Attachment
attacks.effect: Attach a Basic Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Boundless Power
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

attacks.name: Ascension
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a card that evolves from this Pokémon and put it onto this Pokémon to evolve it. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Re-Brew
attacks.effect: Put 2 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon for each Basic {G} Energy card in your discard pile. Then, shuffle those Energy cards into your deck.

attacks.name: Matcha Splash
attacks.effect: Heal 30 damage from each of your Pokémon.

abilities.name: Teal Dance
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may attach a Basic {G} Energy card from your hand to this Pokémon. If you attached Energy to a Pokémon in this way, draw a card.

attacks.name: Myriad Leaf Shower
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 more damage for each Energy attached to both Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hot Magma
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Ground Burn
attacks.effect: Discard the top card of each player's deck. This attack does 140 more damage for each Energy card discarded in this way.

attacks.name: Wrathful Hearth
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dynamic Blaze
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is an Evolution Pokémon, this attack does 140 more damage, and discard all Energy from this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Hero's Spirit
abilities.effect: Put this Pokémon into play only with the effect of Palafin's Zero to Hero Ability.

attacks.name: Giga Impact
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

attacks.name: Sob
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

attacks.name: Torrential Pump
attacks.effect: You may shuffle 3 Energy attached to this Pokémon into your deck. If you do, this attack also does 120 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Piercing Gaze
attacks.effect: Your opponent reveals their hand. Discard a card you find there.

attacks.name: Volt Strike
attacks.effect: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Initialization
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, Pokémon with a Rule Box in play (both yours and your opponent's) have no Abilities, except for Future Pokémon. (Pokémon ex, Pokémon V, etc. have Rule Boxes.)

attacks.name: Volt Cyclone
attacks.effect: Move an Energy from this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Scream
attacks.effect: You can use this attack only if you go second, and only during your first turn. Your opponent can't play any Supporter cards from their hand during their next turn.

attacks.name: Crunch
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Shinobi Blade
attacks.effect: You may search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Mirage Barrage
attacks.effect: Discard 2 Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 120 damage to 2 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Cornerstone Stance
abilities.effect: Prevent all damage from attacks done to this Pokémon by your opponent's Pokémon that have an Ability.

attacks.name: Demolish
attacks.effect: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance, or by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Phantom Dive
attacks.effect: Put 6 damage counters on your opponent's Benched Pokémon in any way you like.

abilities.name: Happy Switch
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may move a Basic Energy from 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Return
attacks.effect: You may draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand.

abilities.name: Seasoned Skill
abilities.effect: Blood Moon used by this Pokémon costs {C} less for each Prize card your opponent has taken.

attacks.name: Blood Moon
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

cards.name: Caretaker
cards.effect: Draw 2 cards. If you drew any cards in this way and if Community Center is in play, shuffle this Caretaker into your deck instead of discarding it.

cards.name: Carmine
cards.effect:
If you go first, you may use this card during your first turn.

Discard your hand and draw 5 cards.

cards.name: Hassel
cards.effect:
You can use this card only if any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out during your opponent's last turn.

Look at the top 8 cards of your deck and put up to 3 of them into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

cards.name: Kieran
cards.effect:
Choose 1:

• Switch your Active Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

• During this turn, attacks used by your Pokémon do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon ex and Active Pokémon V (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

cards.name: Lana's Aid
cards.effect: Put up to 3 in any combination of Pokémon that don't have a Rule Box and Basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your hand. (Pokémon ex, Pokémon V, etc. have Rule Boxes.)

cards.name: Lucian
cards.effect: Each player shuffles their hand and puts it on the bottom of their deck. If either player put any cards on the bottom of their deck in this way, each player flips a coin. If heads, that player draws 6 cards. If tails, they draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Perrin
cards.effect: Reveal up to 2 Pokémon in your hand and put them into your deck. If you do, search your deck for up to that many Pokémon, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Re-Brew
attacks.effect: Put 2 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon for each Basic {G} Energy card in your discard pile. Then, shuffle those Energy cards into your deck.

attacks.name: Matcha Splash
attacks.effect: Heal 30 damage from each of your Pokémon.

abilities.name: Teal Dance
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may attach a Basic {G} Energy card from your hand to this Pokémon. If you attached Energy to a Pokémon in this way, draw a card.

attacks.name: Myriad Leaf Shower
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 more damage for each Energy attached to both Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Wrathful Hearth
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is an Evolution Pokémon, this attack does 140 more damage, and discard all Energy from this Pokémon.

abilities.effect: Blood Moon used by this Pokémon costs {C} less for each Prize card your opponent has taken.

abilities.effect: Blood Moon used by this Pokémon costs {C} less for each Prize card your opponent has taken.

cards.name: Buddy-Buddy Poffin
cards.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Pokémon with 70 HP or less and put them onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Enhanced Hammer
cards.effect: Discard a Special Energy from 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

cards.name: Rescue Board
cards.effect: The Retreat Cost of the Pokémon this card is attached to is {C} less. If that Pokémon's remaining HP is 30 or less, it has no Retreat Cost.
